title: klien_br
author: klien_br
created_time: September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMLast edit: September 20, 2022, 06:50:25 PM by klien_br
content: Is @joeperry really @joeperry?Or is it just an another hacked account recovered from the bitcointalk data leaked in May 2015 ?Any thoughts?I've got proofs for what I say.Exciting to see @joeperry's responses.Quote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:49:33 PMGrateful for all the responses received about.(no matter bad or good).Lemme clear out the case here.I'm an account seller. I DO ACCEPT THAT. But aslike all, I'm doing it to earn a living. This doesn't mean there's no hardwork and I should be pointed out partiating. I was the owner of Joeperry till 14/09/2020. Which obviously I bough back in 2018 and worked hard posting regularly. I don't know where i went wrong but I lost control on 14/09/2020. Which points out that the account was hacked from me.Coming back on forum to sell my rest maintained account i saw joeperry. I remember every account I sell. It was him who stole it from me. Maybe it was sold again. I don't know but it was illegitimately acquired and that's what I'm reporting here.Btw, it aint hard to earn reputation and so did the current owner of joeperry. My heart's with you if it was resold to you by the jacker. But this report must be bought up.I'm working hard similar to others no matter what the work is. Please don't abscond me.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMIs @joeperry really @joeperry?Or is it just an another hacked account recovered from the bitcointalk data leaked in May 2015 ?Any thoughts?I've got proofs for what I say.Exciting to see @joeperry's responses.are these rhetorical questions or what?why don't you post all the evidence right away? why are you trying to create new drama? Post your proof and let the community determine if your proofs are clear enough. at the same time, keep in mind, that if it is about your assumptions and insinuations, it is not certain how valid they are, because you are an account reseller.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMI've got proofs for what I say.Where is the proof? That you hacked it and sold it? Saying that because you are an account seller. Seen on your trust feedback page. Come up with evidence.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: His first post (now deleted)https://ninjastic.space/post/1801784QuoteHi IÂ´m Joeperry from Spain, and I hope that I would be Helpful to others, and you to meÂ  Grin , cheers!!Quote from: joeperry on June 21, 2022, 01:31:42 PMThis is nice but maybe there is a more detailed information about other countries, actually in Philippines I remember that our national sports is Sepak Takraw which is really an entertaining game and a little bit hard but double checking it in the internet it is replaced by Arnis, I actually didn't know that but most of the Filipinos really do love basket ball more than the football.I don't know where the change occurred but if it did in 2015 then it means that all the ratings he received are from the actual owner and not inherited from the former one.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on September 20, 2022, 08:31:41 AMI don't know where the change occurred but if it did in 2015 then it means that all the ratings he received are from the actual owner and not inherited from the former one.There's a long gap indeed in his posting - between 2014-07-14 and 2018-02-17 from what I see - when anything could have happened.But this is so long ago I also agree: his current actions / ratings tell he's okay; he has none from before 2018.So I won't rule out it's an account that has changed hands, but imho it has proven to still be worthy.I won't also rule out that OP may have been selling the account to current owner back then, hence having evidence (and I also don't rule out he wants/wanted to squeeze some more money off joeperry for the info he might have).But imho it doesn't matter. Not in this case.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Account trading is allowed here but discouraged. If I'm correct, few years back, it was not a secret and a lot of people was involved in account trading. But now things have changed. If the account was traded before the transition period, there's nothing wrong.I would also appreciate a response from joeperry and of course, something positive. His current feedbacks are not so old.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMI've got proofs for what I say.I'm confused by your mindset. If you want to make a new drama, why don't you just prove it right away, if you have one?but if you have proof I will assume that this case is account trading. not account hacking. if see the tags on your account.rather than building a wild opinion in a new drama, I think you can provide the evidence you have. it will be highly appreciated by forum members.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMSnippedThis is on what basis, does the account bears another username with thesame details, or was it an already banned account suddenly activating? information giving by you isn't complete and not making sense, just a phrase to say that give no light on a specific area for raising alarm or are you just trying to cause FUD on reputation or what exactly the problem is, no reference, no details and no proof, but it's a pity that this is coming from you, a user with already 3 -tive tags, it won't surprise us if your intention is what we are thinking about.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Hmm, it's appalling when I see some 4 liner, baseless fact with no validated proof to show forth. I see you've gotten some company of red tags so without looking at that -- coupled with your baseless insinuations -- is it supposed to mean that you're against account sales? Cus I have seen pretty much that the references to those tags are still pointing out that you're involved in the same crime as what you're tryna expose which is NONSENSICAL.Dude, you should prolly get a nap so you'd calm your worthless brain cells, maybe they'd give out some more stupid facts when you're awake?!Like I'm always angry when I read some compiled crap like this one.SandraðŸ˜’

If it's still possible I created an electrum account and create a wallet which supports signed message. Please quote & Verify it. Thank you.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----This is JoePerry from Bitcointalk.org and today is August 28, 2018-----BEGIN SIGNATURE-----1Hw1548LnvDB9jTUagtFKNMX51MDc7YYRxIMSKsS2QWMiGH1E/6wEgnHPxRqhOv0hxN6bbx8jdqJDeDN3r+HyF4HymlUeaD+gMVSFIhozpZasUadUNQrVjOmg=-----END BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Quote from: joeperry on March 20, 2021, 05:05:12 AMHello, I'm back again in the forum to do some business and catch up with the crypto while finishing my degree.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----It's joeperry, I'm back at the forum though I'm still finising my degree I want to go back again here in the forum. This is to prove that I'm back, just like what I have posted before that I should provide a signed message. Also I managed to recover my telegram account @jperryc-----BEGIN SIGNATURE-----1Hw1548LnvDB9jTUagtFKNMX51MDc7YYRxIA61iINqmQX8H4f5Gqtykzxu1Z/Od6q0q/3EXpJPyT7Bb3LuOna01NDsYtlKQrh6McwnI45HrmbQbmb3BWywQzQ=-----END BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Permalink

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on September 21, 2022, 06:39:00 AMI might hold keys for some of the above addresses but I don't have any intentions to claim back this account again so it might not be worth wasting the time. I just want to clear the stuff and know how the account was jacked from me byÂ  the current owner of @Joeperry.You might hold the keys? Why such a vague statement? Either you hold the keys or you don't. To clear things up, you need to prove your words, and the only way to do this is by providing evidence. Otherwise this is just a empty story and no one will believe you. Quote from: klien_br on September 21, 2022, 06:39:00 AMI'm tring to contact him since a month but don't know why he's ignoring me.. He shouldn't do this if he is not at fault. Even tagging him here won't work. Maybe he is intentionally ignoring this thread.If it were me, I'd probably ignore this thread too, until someone posted something worth responding to. Partiality has nothing to do with this discussion. Until you can prove your case, I don't see any reason to discuss it further.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on September 20, 2022, 07:44:01 AMQuote from: klien_br on September 20, 2022, 06:13:37 AMI've got proofs for what I say.Where is the proof? That you hacked it and sold it? Saying that because you are an account seller. Seen on your trust feedback page. Come up with evidence.From what I understand in OP, he isn't claiming to have hacked it himself. Â In summary, +He originally owned Joeperry (Either through the leak in 2015 as stated or created the account) I wasn't around in 2015+ He sold Joeperry (Below is a quote to support #Bought back)QuoteWhich obviously I bough back in 2018+ Then it was hacked from him on 14/09/2020. You could correct me if am wrong.If my above summary might be true, then there are some questions to these claims.Haven't sould the account previously, 1. Why going to buy it back?Did you actually bought it back or you hacked it from the buyer, after you had sold it. Making you the first to have hacked the account, haven't had ties to it. (Suspicion)2. Could it be that, the buyer later hacked it from you again or it is as you claim. To have bought and then you got hacked?One of the ways to prove you had at some point owned the said account is as @Examplens suggested.Quote from: examplens on September 20, 2022, 10:47:20 PMIf we talking about this joeperry can you sign or even send a specific amount from any of the addresses used by this account? that would certainly come if you had control over that account at some time.I find a few of them on https://ninjastic.space/user/id/97179?addressesNow your response to that is honourable,Quote from: klien_br on September 21, 2022, 06:34:23 AMI might hold keys for some of the above addresses but I don't have any intentions to claim back this account again so it might not be worth wasting the time. I just want to clear the stuff and know how the account was jacked from me by Â the current owner of @Joeperry.Although, the forum users cannot be satisfied with just claims. You've got to prove you owned it at some point so users would be weary and just words won't do that.
